name: Window.pageYOffset
description: The read-only Window property pageYOffset is an alias for scrollY; as such, it returns the number of pixels the document is currently scrolled along the vertical axis (that is, up or down) with a value of 0.0, indicating that the top edge of the Document is currently aligned with the top edge of the window's content area.

refs.name: CSS Object Model (CSSOM) View Module
refs.description: The definition of 'window.pageYOffset' in CSS Object Model (CSSOM) View Module.
